function.name: CO_CALC_MONTO_IVA_ICE
function.body:
v_ResultStr NUMBER:=0; BEGIN
select case when sum(i.taxamt) is null
then 0 else sum(i.taxamt) end into v_ResultStr from c_invoicetax i, c_taxcategory tc, c_tax t where i.c_tax_id = t.c_tax_id and t.c_taxcategory_id = tc.c_taxcategory_id and tc.em_co_es_ice = p_ice and i.c_invoice_id = p_invoice_id;
return v_ResultStr; END CO_CALC_MONTO_IVA_ICE
